text: Ivan Ivanov (24 April 1937 - 27 August 2010) was a Bulgarian wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman lightweight at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Bulgarian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Bulgaria Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Ivan Ivanov (wrestler, born 1937)
